application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.1 Beech - Re-balance crown by reducing the over extended half by 1-2m & thinning crown by 10%.T.3 Ginkgo - 1-2m Reduction in height to suitable growth points & 20% crown thin.
